Photon.Pun.UtilityScripts.GraphicToggleIsOnTransition Class Reference Photon.Pun.UtilityScripts.GraphicToggleIsOnTransition
Use this on toggles texts to have some color transition on the text depending on the isOn State.

Detailed Description
Use this on toggles texts to have some color transition on the text depending on the isOn State.
